20110111024655.000|20110111024656.000|CC1|LINE WHEN SHE USED GUN IMAGERY  
20110111024656.000|20110111024658.000|CC1|LAST YEAR AGAINST 20 DEMOCRATS, 
20110111024658.000|20110111024701.000|CC1|INCLUDING GABRIELLE GIFFORDS.   
20110111024701.000|20110111024703.000|CC1|>> BUT THIS B.S. COMING FROM THE
20110111024703.000|20110111024704.000|CC1|LAME STREAM MEDIA LATELY ABOUT  
20110111024704.000|20110111024706.000|CC1|THIS, ABOUT US INCITING

20110111024708.000|20110111024709.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THIS MAP FROM  
20110111024709.000|20110111024710.000|CC1|PALIN'S WEBSITE TARGETED
